nairobi.name: Edmor Residences Riverside
nairobi.description: Located in Nairobi, Edmor Residences Riverside offers accommodations with a patio or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a shared lounge and a garden.% There's a private bathroom with shower and slippers in each unit, along with free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the apartment.% A terrace is available for guests to use at Edmor Residences Riverside.

nairobi.name: Prime Living Luxury Apartments
nairobi.description: With city views, Prime Living Luxury Apartments is located in Nairobi and has a restaurant and a 24-hour front desk. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the apartment free of charge.% Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries.% A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also featured, as well as an electric tea pot and a coffee machine.% Prime Living Luxury Apartments offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast.% Cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

nairobi.name: Taarifa Suites by Dunhill Serviced Apartments
nairobi.description: Located in Nairobi, a 4-minute walk from Nairobi National Museum and 2.9 km from Kenyatta International Conference Centre, Taarifa Suites by Dunhill Serviced Apartments provides accommodations with free WiFi, air conditioning, a restaurant and a fitness center.% Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as an electric tea pot.%Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

nairobi.name: L'Aziz Suites
nairobi.description: Located 2.1 km from Nairobi National Museum, L'Aziz Suites has accommodations with a shared lounge, a terrace and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience. The condo hotel features both WiFi and private parking free of charge.%Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Some units feature a patio and/or a balcony with garden or city views.%Guests at L'Aziz Suites can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast.
